name: MEMORYLOADER.EXE
description:
Hello.

We at MyndScript strive to bring you, the player, the best experience possible. Using our new software, MEMORYLOADER, players can relive key events in a person's life in order to better understand experiences unique to them. 

This file is a test of MEMORYLOADER, featuring one available subject allowing you to attempt to experience DYSPHORIA. If you or a loved one would like to upload your experiences to our MEMORYLOADER service, please comment below and you will be connected with a MyndScript agent.

Now, feel free to feel what others have felt.
